name: Yamaha YZF-R6
description: Yamaha YZF R6 is a flagship supersport motorcycle, available in 1 variant. YZF R6 generates 118.4 HP @ 14,500 rpm of power and 61.7 Nm @ 10500 rpm of torque from its 599 cc, 4-cylinder, 4-stroke, 16 titanium valves, liquid-cooled, DOHC engine.

name: Yamaha Vmax
description: The Vmax is the only sports cruiser motorcycle in India from Yamaha. The Vmax is powered by 1679cc V4 liquid-cooled engine that produces 200bhp at 9,000rpm and maximum torque of 167Nm at 6,500rpm.

name: Yamaha FZ X
description: The new Yamaha FZ-X will be available in two variants â€“ standard and with Y-Connect Bluetooth tech. The Yamaha FZ X is powered by 149cc BS6 engine which develops a power of 12.2 bhp and a torque of 13.3 Nm.

name: Yamaha Ray ZR 125
description: The Yamaha Ray ZR 125 is powered by 125cc BS6 engine which develops a power of 8.04 bhp and a torque of 10.3 Nm. With both front and rear drum brakes, Yamaha Ray ZR 125 comes up with combined braking system of both wheels.

name: Yamaha FZ S FI
description: Yamaha FZ S FI is a street bike available in 2 variants and 5 colours. The Yamaha FZ S FI is powered by 149cc BS6 engine which develops a power of 12.2 bhp and a torque of 13.3 Nm. With both front and rear disc brakes, Yamaha FZ S FI comes up with anti-locking braking system. This FZ S FI bike weighs 135 kg and has a fuel tank capacity of 13 liters.
